playlist

Class PlaylistEntry

  • Object
    • PlaylistEntry

  • public class PlaylistEntry
extends Object
    A playlist entry describes a position in a music video chart for Playlist. So what video it is, and what text to display onscreen for that video
    Author:
    tony

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private String artistName 
      private String fileUNC 
      private int positionInPlaylist 
      private String trackInfo 
      private String trackName 
      private MusicVideo video 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlaylistEntry(MusicVideo video)
      We allow a contructor with just a Music Video, from which we determine the filepath
      PlaylistEntry(MusicVideo video, String trackName, String artistName, String trackInfo)
      We allow a constructor with full details for setting a full entry

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PlaylistEntry validatePlaylistEntry(PlaylistEntry entry)
      If we cannot source the video associated with this entry, we will call on the entry to validate itself

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlaylistEntry

        public PlaylistEntry(MusicVideo video)
        We allow a contructor with just a Music Video, from which we determine the filepath
        Parameters:
        video - the music video

      • PlaylistEntry

        public PlaylistEntry(MusicVideo video,
             String trackName,
             String artistName,
             String trackInfo)
        We allow a constructor with full details for setting a full entry
        Parameters:
        video - the music video
        trackName - the text track name given to the item
        artistName - the text artist name given to the item
        trackInfo - the text track information given to the item

    • Method Detail

      • validatePlaylistEntry

        public PlaylistEntry validatePlaylistEntry(PlaylistEntry entry)
                                    throws MediaOpenException
        If we cannot source the video associated with this entry, we will call on the entry to validate itself
        Parameters:
        entry -
        Returns:
        null if the file pointed to is not valid, else returns the new playlist entry
        Throws:
        MediaOpenException
